tool_description: API for AlDente Rewards app, for more information download AlDenteRewards app from Apple store or Google play
name: AlDenteAPI
title: AlDenteAPI

api_list.name: GET  Rcard user transaction detail
api_list.description: use this request to review all transactions made by an specific user using the card number

api_list.name: GET sftRest overview
api_list.description: Branch overview with number of users and total sales

api_list.name: GET sftRest user summary
api_list.description: get specific user summary with visits and transactions

api_list.name: GET SftRest All details by customer:
api_list.description: Detailed report from a single user for sftrest

api_list.name: Sales Summary
api_list.description: Provides JSON with sales summary per end point

api_list.name: GET  user per range softRest
api_list.description: Get user activity per range and stores under same client
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com/sales/users/Bernardi/start/2022-09-30/end/2022-10-03"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com/sales/users/{clientid}/start/{startdate}/end/{enddate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
